BitMask: Your Swiss Army Knife for Native Bitcoin Finance.
Our pioneering, decentralized non-custodial wallet solution supports RGB20 and RGB21 assets, as well as Lightning Network and Taproot. 

Experience advanced wallet infrastructure for all your Bitcoin needs. It is a browser extension that allows you to access decentralized applications on the Bitcoin blockchain using RGB protocol.
It enables you to discover and explore Bitcoin‚Äôs Unique Digital Assets (UDAs), Native Bitcoin Finance, and other  unexplored bitcoin utility.

By using BitMask, you can experience true financial sovereignty and take control of your Bitcoin journey with these advanced features.

üöÄ What's New with BitMask 0.7.4 Beta

‚≠êÔ∏è RGB 0.11_beta 6 Upgrade

We have upgraded to the latest version of RGB, enhancing performance and compatibility with the official RGB libraries and proxies.

‚≠êÔ∏è Comprehensive Bug Fixes and Error Reporting

All critical wallet bugs have been resolved, ensuring a smoother and more reliable user experience. Error reporting have been optimized too.

 ü§å New Wallet Recommendation

Due to the RGB version upgrade, we recommend creating a brand new wallet for optimal performance. If you have assets on Bitcoin mainnet, please transfer them out before deleting the older wallet.BitMask is a self-custody wallet, please be watchful and careful with main-net funds.

‚≠êÔ∏è Improved Testing on Signet

All RGB-related tests are now better and faster on bitcoin signet, providing a more efficient testing environment.

‚≠êÔ∏è Initial BTC <> RGB21 Atomic Swap Support

We have introduced initial support for BTC <> RGB21 atomic swaps. This will allow seamless P2P trades across the web.

‚≠êÔ∏è RGB20 Token Transfers Supported

RGB20 token transfers are now supported. The transfers work, however they are not as stable as we expect them to be

‚≠êÔ∏è Native Bitcoin Swaps

While not yet stable, we are making progress on native Bitcoin swaps in BitMask and the DIBA marketplace and will continue to refine this feature.

Our Mission
Our mission is to empower humanity by extending Bitcoin‚Äôs utility natively. We focus on the individual, aiming to benefit the entire human community. By using our tools, people can access assets that are resistant to censorship, highly secure, and protected against surveillance capitalism. We believe that achieving this mission will help create a more equitable and free society for all.
